entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
